data.title: Adventures Resort & Retreat Centre
data.meta_description: Long Point Eco-Adventures is a restaurant, glamping and adventure resort located in Turkey Point, Southwestern Ontario.
data.text:
Deluxe Pods

These charming wooden yurt style units are designed for comfort and convenience, featuring a cozy queen bed and a pull-out sofa, making them perfect for a group of three or couples seeking a romantic getaway. Each unit offers the convenience of a 1/2 bath, a private fire pit, and a mini fridge to enhance your stay. And to ensure a pleasant and refreshing experience, air-conditioning is provided in each unit to keep you cool during those hot summer nights.

View all of our lodging options >

Book a Deluxe Pod >

Elite Pods

These charming wooden yurt style units are designed for comfort and convenience, featuring a cozy queen, making them perfect for couples seeking a romantic getaway. Each unit offers the convenience of a full indoor bath, a private fire pit, and a mini fridge to enhance your stay. And to ensure a pleasant and refreshing experience, air-conditioning is provided in each unit to keep you cool during those hot summer nights.

View all of our lodging options >

Book an Elite Pod >

Deluxe Pod Clusters

Available in 2 or 3 units, perfect for larger groups. Each cluster coming with an additional 'living room' pod for extra entertainment space in poor weather.

These charming wooden yurt style units are designed for comfort and convenience, featuring a cozy queen & pull-out sofa, making them perfect for couples seeking a romantic getaway. Each unit offers the convenience of a 1/2 bath, and a mini fridge to enhance your stay. Units all share an outdoor shower and communal fire pit. To ensure a pleasant and refreshing experience, air-conditioning is provided in each unit to keep you cool during those hot summer nights.

View all of our lodging options >

Book a 2 unit cluster >

Book a 3 unit cluster >

Camping Pods

These charming wooden yurt style units are designed for comfort and convenience, featuring your choice of a queen bed or double twin. Each unit offers the convenience of a private fire pit and a mini fridge to enhance your stay. To ensure a pleasant and refreshing experience, air-conditioning is provided in each unit to keep you cool during those hot summer nights.

View all of our lodging options >

Book a Twin Camping Pod >

Book a Queen Camping Pod >

Mabee Marsh Cabin

Experience the charm of our Mabee Marsh Cabin, a rustic wood lodge that offers a full kitchen, comfortable sleeping quarters for up to 18 people, and two inviting fireplaces. With ample indoor and outdoor space for entertaining, this is the ultimate retreat to reconnect with nature, minus the inconvenience of traditional camping.

Complete with four bedrooms, an outdoor volleyball court, horseshoe pit, BBQ, and direct trail access, it's the perfect getaway spot for groups or bach/bachelorettes!

View all of our lodging options >

Book the Mabee Marsh Cabin>

Rollercoaster Bunkhouse

Experience this mountain biker's haven, right next to the Turkey Point trail network! With ample indoor and outdoor space for entertaining, this is the ultimate retreat to reconnect with nature, minus the inconvenience of traditional camping.

Complete with four bedrooms, an outdoor fire pit, dining space, BBQ, and direct trail access, it's the perfect getaway spot for groups or bach/bachelorettes!

View all of our lodging options >

BOOKING COMING SOON

Marshview Patio & Bar - OPEN TO THE PUBLIC

Whether you choose to relax on our multi-level patio, bask in the cozy ambiance of our all-season restaurant, or enjoy the best of both worlds, Marshview Patio & Bar promises a culinary experience like no other.

Under the skillful guidance of Executive Chef Shelli Bosgoed, our on-site dining options boast a diverse array of flavors designed to cater to every palate, all with a delightful local twist. Treat yourself to creatively crafted cocktails, an extensive selection of beers and wines, and a tempting array of shareable dishes that are sure to tantalize your taste buds.

Whether you're planning a night out with friends, a romantic dinner for two, or even corporate catering, our venue is the perfect choice for any occasion.

View menu & hours >

2024 CATERING MENU COMING SOON!

Hometown Brew Co.

Come and experience the unparalleled craftsmanship and dedication to local ingredients at Hometown Brew Co., an established and award-winning brewery. Immerse yourself in the vibrant flavors of our handcrafted brews by booking a tasting session, embarking on a brewery tour, or hosting your event in our unique outdoor sea-can space.

Whether you're a seasoned craft beer enthusiast or new to the scene, our brewery offers the perfect setting to indulge in the finest flavours and discover the artistry behind each pint. Join us for an unforgettable journey through the world of craft beer - cheers to local flavour!

Visit their website>

Beer tastings & tours coming soon!

Picnic Lunch

Indulge in this delightful culinary adventure that allows you to satisfy your hunger while exploring new surroundings. Whether you choose to enjoy your picnic on-site, at the nearby winery, or by the picturesque Turkey Point Beach, each basket is filled with a delicious wrap, refreshing side salad, juicy fruit, and a drink of your choice.

Don't worry, we also offer vegan and vegetarian options to cater to all dietary preferences. Embark on a flavorful journey with our Picnic Lunch experience today!

Visit the Marshview Patio webpage >
